## Context.emitEvent() method

A strongly-typed method to emit context events

**Signature:**

```typescript
emitEvent<T extends ContextEvent>(type: string, event: T): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  type | string | Event type |
|  event | T | Context event |

**Returns:**

void
